name: GetMap
description:
The GetMap call implements the Web Map Service 1.1.1 standard
to access TomTom raster map tiles. This service is described
in the response to the GetCapabilities API call.

versionNumber.description: Version of the service to call. The current version is 1

srs.description: Projection used in describing the bbox EPSG:3857 is recommended, particularly at higher zoom levels. (Note that EPSG:3857 is functionally equivalent to EPSG:900913/EPSG:3785)

bbox.description: Bounding box in the projection stated in srs (minLon,minLat,maxLon,maxLat)

width.description: Width of the resulting image, in pixels Maximum value is 2048

height.description: Height of the resulting image, in pixels Maximum value is 2048

layers.description: Map layers requested Currently only the basic layer is available

styles.description:
Map styles to be returned. Currently, no styles are available. This
parameter is present for forward compatibility; it must be used and
left blank.
